law.catch_line: The Board shall give preference to venture capital fund proposals that:...
law.text:
The Board shall give preference to venture capital fund proposals that:
provide financing predominately to businesses that conduct a substantial amount of business in the State;
require venture capital funds to match the money invested by the Trust with money invested by private investors on at least a 1 to 3 ratio; and
ensure that a majority of the money that the Trust invests is for seed capital financing in the State.
